=== Hardware details ===
* Toshiba Satellite L30-10T
* Intel® Pentium® Dual-Core Processor T2080 (1.73 GHz)
* 1024MB RAM
* 80 GB Harddisk
* DVD/CD-RW 8x/24x
* Screen : 15.4” WXGA TFT (1280x800) 
* Sound : ATI SB450 HDA
* Modem V.92 Data/Fax Modem.
* LAN 10/100 Base-TX (RTL 8139)
* Graphic : ATI Radeon® Xpress 200M (128 MB shared) 
* Wireless 802.11b/g -(AR5005G) Atheros Communications inc.
